name: Sensitive Data Scanner
description: Comprehensive scanner for 40+ types of exposed sensitive data including API keys, tokens, credit cards, private keys, database credentials, and service-specific secrets
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
remediation: Never expose secrets in responses. Use secure secret management. Mask sensitive data in logs and responses. Implement proper access controls. Rotate exposed credentials immediately. Use data loss prevention (DLP) tools.
